lead_paragraph: One of the biggest stories an American newspaper could print today would be an accurate account of the dealings our Navy has had with submarines: how many, if any, have been sunk or damaged, where, and under what circumstances. Next in importance would come a complete list of submarines sunk by the British since the beginning of the war.
